divs: Sighting Detailsaround 7-8 pm was turning onto my street facing south seen in the night sky between 25-35 degrees at least 2 miles .away south of I-10. hovering 5 balls of white lights closely grouped together almost touching.slanted from left to right, right side was higher. they looked hot. not like a round light but more of a fire ball.there seemed to be white hot weldikng sparks dropping from the bottom of the lights on the left side. i stayed in my vehicle and kept driving until my view was obscured . the sighting lasted 20 seconds. i have been around aircraft all of my life and in the military . this was not an civilian aircraft and like nothing ive seen in the military. i now look in the sky before i go outside at night. everytime.
trends: There have been no other sightings in grandbay
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: 5balls of white light grouped closely hovering with welding sparks falling off
